DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether well-established case management model call Critical Time Intervention ( CTI ) help individual hoard disorder concern risk eviction . Each individual hoarding disorder assign work CTI Specialist 9 month , provide referral mental health treatment , legal consultation , registration entitlement . All participant offer facilitate group intervention call Buried Treasures Workshop . The CTI Specialist also facilitate reconnecting individual supportive family/friends monitor support de-cluttering patient 's home . A second comparison group offer group intervention ( Buried Treasures Workshop ) without part CTI protocol .
